name: VCMO 5-Min Crypto Price Action Strategy
description: Aggressive intraday crypto system that trades 5-minute bars using the Volume Cluster Momentum Oscillator (VCMO) with price-action confirmation, 2 % risk per trade, 0.5 % initial/trailing stop and 0.75 % target (1.5R). Designed for liquid coins (BTC, ETH) and single-position management.
